chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing
a: R
f: R -> V

Goal:
RInt f a a = zero

Premises:
RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => iota (is_RInt f a b) : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Notation CompleteNormedModule := CompleteNormedModule.type
*** [ R : Set ]
RInt_ext = fun (f g : R -> V) (a b : R) (Hfg : forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) => eq_close (RInt f a b) (RInt g a b) (close_iota (is_RInt f a b) (is_RInt g a b) (fun x : V => conj (is_RInt_ext f g a b x Hfg) (is_RInt_ext g f a b x (SYM2 Hfg)))) : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> RInt f a b = RInt g a b Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope function_scope]
opp_RInt_swap = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (H : ex_RInt f a b) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ If HIf => Logic.eq_sym (is_RInt_unique f b a (opp (RInt f a b)) (is_RInt_swap f b a (RInt f a b) (RInt_correct f a b (ex_intro (fun If0 : V => is_RInt f a b If0) If HIf)))) end : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> opp (RInt f a b) = RInt f b a Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
filterlim_ext : forall f0 g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f0 x = g x) -> filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Type] ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Type] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Filter ?F]
iota_unique : forall (P : ?V -> Prop) (x : ?V), (forall y : ?V, P y -> y = x) -> P x -> iota P = x where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- CompleteNormedModule ?K]
eq_close : forall x y : ?V, close x y -> x = y where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
scal_one : forall u : ?V, scal one u = u where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Ring] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- ModuleSpace ?K]
filterlim_const : forall a0 : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a0) ?F (locally a0) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Type] ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- UniformSpace] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Filter ?F]
is_RInt_unique = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V) => iota_filterlim_locally (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) l : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> RInt f a b = l Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Type] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Filter ?F]
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_opp : forall x : ?V, filterlim opp (locally x) (locally (opp x)) where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat2 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_switch_dom : forall F1 : (?T1 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F1 -> forall F2 : (?T2 -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F2 -> forall dom : ?T2 -> Prop, (forall P : ?T2 -> Prop, F2 P -> exists x : ?T2, dom x /\ P x) -> forall (f0 : ?T1 -> ?T2 -> ?U) (g : ?T2 -> ?U) (h : ?T1 -> ?U), filterlim (fun (x : ?T1) (y : {z : ?T2 | dom z}) => f0 x (sval y)) F1 (locally (fun y : {z : ?T2 | dom z} => g (sval y))) -> (forall x : ?T1, filterlim (f0 x) (within dom F2) (locally (h x))) ->...-> V |- CompleteSpace]
opp_opp : forall x : ?G, opp (opp x) = x where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- AbelianGroup]
Proper_StrongProper : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter' F where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- Type]
iota_filterlimi_locally = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : CompleteNormedModule K) (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V -> Prop) (l : V) (Hf : F (fun x : T => forall y1 y2 : V, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) (Hl : filterlimi f F (locally l)) => iota_unique (fun x : V => filterlimi f F (locally x)) l (fun (l' : V) (Hl' : filterlimi f F (locally l')) => filterlimi_locally_unique f l' l Hf Hl' Hl) Hl : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : CompleteNormedModule K) (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> V -> Prop)...
close_iota : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x <-> Q x) -> close (iota P) (iota Q) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- CompleteSpace]
iota_correct_weak : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x y : ?T, P x -> P y -> close x y) -> forall x : ?T, P x -> close (iota P) x where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- CompleteSpace]
RInt_correct = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (H : ex_RInt f a b) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ If HIf => eq_ind_r (fun s : V => is_RInt f a b s) HIf (is_RInt_unique f a b If HIf) end : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> is_RInt f a b (RInt f a b) Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
is_RInt_point = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a : R) => let H : forall (f0 : SF_seq -> V) (y : V), (forall eps : posreal, Riemann_fine a a (fun x : SF_seq => ball y eps (f0 x))) -> filterlim f0 (Riemann_fine a a) (locally y) := fun (f0 : SF_seq -> V) (y : V) => match filterlim_locally f0 y with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (a - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) zero (fun eps : posreal => ex_intro (fun delta : posreal => forall y : SF_seq, seq_step (SF_lx y) < delta -> pointed_subdiv y /\ SF_h y = Rmin a a /\ last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) = Rmax a a...
ball_center : forall (x : ?M) (e : posreal), ball x e x where ?M : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- UniformSpace]
locally_ball : forall (x : ?T) (eps : posreal), locally x (ball x eps) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V |- UniformSpace]
is_RInt_swap = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) (HIf : filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (a - b)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine b a) (locally If)) => (fun _evar_0_ : filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally (scal (opp one) If)) => eq_ind (scal (opp one) If) (fun _pattern_value_ : V => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally _pattern_value_)) _evar_0_ (opp If) (scal_opp_one If)) (filterlim_ext (...
iota_filterlim_locally = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : CompleteNormedModule K) (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V) (l : V) => iota_is_filter_lim l : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : CompleteNormedModule K) (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> V) (l : V), filterlim f F (locally l) -> iota (fun x : V => filterlim f F (locally x)) = l Arguments K, V, T, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ type_scope function_scope _ function_scope _ _]
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
is_RInt_ext = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f g : R -> V) (a b : R) => ssr_wlog (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 < b0 -> forall l : V, (forall x : R, Rmin a0 b0 < x < Rmax a0 b0 -> f x = g x) -> is_RInt f a0 b0 l -> is_RInt g a0 b0 l) (fun (Hw : forall a0 b0 : R, a0 < b0 -> forall l : V, (forall x : R, Rmin a0 b0 < x < Rmax a0 b0 -> f x = g x) -> is_RInt f a0 b0 l -> is_RInt g a0 b0 l) (l : V) (Heq : forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) (Hf : is_RInt f a b l)...
Riemann_fine_unif_part = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (Hf : forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) (Hab : a <= b) => let Hab' : 0 <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) := Rdiv_le_0_compat (b - a) (INR n + 1) (let H : forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 <-> 0 <= b0 - a0 := Rminus_le_0 in let a0 := a in let H0 : forall b0 : R, a0 <= b0 <-> 0 <= b0 - a0 := H a0 in let a1 := b in let H1 : a <= a1 <-> 0 <= a1 - a := H0 a1 in match H1 with | conj H2 _ => H2 Hab end) (IN...
Riemann_sum_norm = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq) => SF_cons_ind (fun ptd0 : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd0 -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd0 <= t <= last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) -> norm (f t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f ptd0) <= Riemann_sum g ptd0) (fun (x0 : R) (_ : pointed_subdiv (SF_nil x0)) (_ : forall t : R, x0 <= t <= x0 -> norm (f t) <= g t) => (fun _evar_0_ : 0 <= Riemann_sum g (SF_nil x0) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : R => _pattern_value_ <= Riemann_sum g (SF_nil x0)) _evar_0_...
CompleteNormedModule.sort = fun (K : AbsRing) (t : CompleteNormedModule K) => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : forall K : AbsRing, CompleteNormedModule K -> Type CompleteNormedModule.sort is a coercion

```coq
intros V a f.
rewrite RInt_correct with (f := f) (a := a) (b := a).
rewrite opp_RInt_swap with (f := f) (a := a) (b := a).
apply filterlim_opp.
Qed.```
